text: Robert Andrew Crawford Wells (born April 10, 1968) is a politician and former college football coach. Wells ran for the Constitution Party's nomination for President in 2012. He ran as an independent in the 2016 presidential election. He was a candidate in the 2020 Democratic Party presidential primaries. In January 2024, Wells said he was going to run in for U.S. House of Representatives in Virginia's 6th congressional district as an independent. Wells is also running for President in 2024. Him and his Vice President Tony Jones has ballot access in Rhode Island under the Party Party of Rhode Island. == References == Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:American politicians Category:College football coaches
title: Robby Wells
